description.ko: 빛이 공허에 삼켜지는 우주의 장엄함 앞에 서 있는 침묵의 파수꾼.
description.en: A silent sentinel standing before the majesty of the universe, where light is swallowed by the void.

prompt: An ancient, ornate celestial gate standing at the edge of a massive event horizon. Surrounded by swirling nebulous gas clouds of deep violet and indigo, with millions of star clusters scattered across the infinite void. Cosmic scale, cosmic horror majesty. 8k, Octane Render, raytracing. Volumetric gas simulations, dramatic lighting from the accretion disk, and global illumination from distant supernovae. Detailed textures of weathered space-stone and ethereal energy fields.
